Header: Education Minister is prepared to reopen schools on the 06th
Content: Education Minister Akila Viraj Kriyawasam has said that security in all schools has been consolidated. Accordingly, the Minister said that all schools will reopen with the approval of the security sectors. The Education Minister said that they have requested the defence sectors that if the schools are to reopen on, it should be done with strict security conditions. Also the necessary security should be accorded after the opening of the schools. Accordingly agreement has been reached to provide at least one Police Office to each school and to inspect the schools, He said that the Government has taken all security measures for the safety of the children. He added that they have decide to reopen the school after getting approval from all security sectors.
